articles.author: Ellen Mitchell
articles.title: SXSW controversy spikes as bands drop out over military ties - The Hill
articles.description: Controversy surrounding the annual South by Southwest festival, familiarly called SXSW, has spiked after more than 100 acts, the majority of them European, dropped out over the U.S. Army’s and defense contractors’ sponsorship of the music and cultural event i…
